author: fradamt
content: That’s right. The only thing boost should do is to allow all attestors to agree with the proposer of their slot, when there’s some balancing going on. We don’t want to leave any residual power to the proposer afterwards, so it only applies to attestations in this slot

author: m.kalinin
content: `prepareBeaconProposer`  gives BN information on which validators is served by it and at which slots it supposed to produce a block. Without having this information BN couldn't set the build process in motion beforehand as it is intended by Engine API spec; `feeRecipient` is only a part of information that is required to properly start payload build processes
